text: function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4561381427001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14561381427001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4561381427001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4561381427001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14561381427001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4561381427001.init(); ai_type="video"; } Doctor Who dealt in fantasy, farce and mind-bending twists in tonight's 'The Girl Who Died'.Hit play above to hear DS TV Editor Morgan give his verdict in the latest instalment of Geek TV. Â© BBC Doctor Who review: 'The Girl Who Died' is unlike anything you've seen beforeDoctor Who review: 'Before the Flood' is scary and smartWhat did you make of Maisie Williams? Were you charmed by the episode's lighter moments? And what did you think of that climax - from the "Who frowned me this face?" reveal, to Ashildr's miraculous resurrection?Share your thoughts on tonight's utterly mad episode in the comments section below.Join Morgan again next Saturday night for more Geek TV - when we'll meet The Knightmare and his fire-breathing accomplice, and reunite with 'The Woman Who Lived'.
